title: ALICE AI ChatBot (Gemini API)
description: An advanced AI assistant using Gemini 1.5 Flash. Beyond chat, it automates Document and PPT generation directly from user prompts for instant download.

title: Titanic Survival Predictor
description: A classic Machine Learning classification project predicting passenger survival using features like age, gender, and class with Scikit-Learn.

title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
description: Computer Vision project using a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) and TensorFlow/Keras to achieve high accuracy on the MNIST digit dataset.

title: House Price Prediction
description: Predictive modeling using the California housing dataset. Features a comparison between full-feature training and dimensionality reduction for accuracy analysis.

title: Spam Email Classifier
description: Natural Language Processing (NLP) application that utilizes Scikit-Learn to filter and classify emails as spam or ham based on text patterns.

title: Iris & Wine Model Training
description: Deep dive into model evaluation using train_test_split on Sklearnâ€™s Iris and Wine datasets to master classification fundamentals.

title: Advanced Dataset Analysis
description: A comprehensive repository showcasing exploratory data analysis (EDA) and visualization techniques across various real-world datasets.

title: Python Programming Suite
description: A collection of mini-projects and automation scripts developed while mastering Python core concepts and logic.
